summary:
Saved at the first town. 
Just got out of the cave after selling some things. 
Triss light armor stand alone set(added with console) 
Eyepatch. (went with the eyepatch to match up with the scar so i can keep the hair)
Level 2 - haven\'t done any quests at all.
descriptionHtml:
Textures to look like her, names are exactly as they are listed. 

Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- v0_2 - by Caliente
Female Warpaints - by KrimsonLust
Triss Outfitt For TES V Skyrim - by Fraper
Full Body Tattoo for CBBE v2 Females - No Hair 1 - by Jammer2006
-CBBE-femfeet Compilation - Nailpolish - black fingernails - by Nadezhda90 
Better females by bella(install before coverwomen)- makeup version 3 - by BellaGail
Coverwomen - look 1 - by mrLenski
Catwalk - exaggerated - by rickyrickylo
Coolsims Hair Pack - by newermind43
Coolsims Hair Retexture - by Bloodysunday
Bright Purple and Deep Indigo eyes by DalekBarbarian
Eyepatch - by Ceekay9

You will get the save relics pop up, have lots of mods installed.
So if she doens\'t look like the image, let me know and i\'ll see what mods I missed. 


To get the vibrant hair colours.

Bring up the console. (~)
Type showracemenu
Type setrace argonian
Type sexchange
This changes your character to a male argonian.
Then scroll over to hair and pick your hair style and then the colour, they\'re more vibrant.
Once you got your hair set, do the following.
Type setrace nord
Type sexchange
Changes you back to a female nord with the vibrant hair colour.
Works for other races as well.
Makeup and warpaint resets though, so you need to readd those.
author: ArsenicTouch
